attributes.action: Don't include benefit entitlement for people with pre-settled and settled status
attributes.additional_details:
Stop EU citizens with pre settled and settled status from claiming benefits:
- Income Support
- income-related Jobseekers’ Allowance (JSA)
- income-related Employment Support Allowance (ESA)
- Pension Credit
- Housing Benefit
- Universal Credit
- PIP
 
https://www.london.gov.uk/what-we-do/eu-londoners-hub/compare-your-rights-pre-settled-and-settled-status
 
This will bring them in line with other non-citizens in the UK.
attributes.background:
EU citizens with pre-settled status have the same access to benefits as they did prior to the introduction of the EU Settlement Scheme.

https://www.citizensadvice.org.uk/benefits/claiming-benefits-if-youre-from-the-EU/before-you-apply/check-if-you-can-get-benefits-if-youre-from-the-eu/
